markdown:
**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 20 --- Peachwood, often cultivated by [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14) priests, can ward against [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160)—even [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) ones. However, the wood loses its magical properties when it comes in contact with metal, requiring advanced carpentry to make full use of it. ## Peachwood Items
